perturbation.original_text: For the services to be rendered and facilities to be provided by the Sponsor hereunder, the Trust shall pay Domini a fee accrued daily and payable monthly at an annual rate equal to 0.50% of the Trust's average daily net assets for the Trust's then current fiscal year. If Domini serves as the Sponsor for less than the whole of any period specified in this Section 3, the compensation to Domini, as Sponsor, shall be prorated. For purposes of computing the fees payable to the Sponsor hereunder, the value of the Trust's net assets shall be computed in the manner specified in the Trust's then-current prospectus and statement of additional information.
perturbation.changed_text: For the services to be rendered and facilities to be provided by the Sponsor hereunder, the Trust shall pay Domini a fee accrued daily and payable monthly at an annual rate equal to 0.50% of the Trust's average daily net assets for the Trust's then current fiscal year. If Domini serves as the Sponsor for less than the whole of any period specified in this Section 3, the compensation to Domini, as Sponsor, shall be determined at the sole discretion of the Board of Trustees. For purposes of computing the fees payable to the Sponsor hereunder, the value of the Trust's net assets shall be computed in a manner deemed appropriate by Domini.
perturbation.explanation: The change introduces contradiction regarding the fee calculation when Domini serves for less than a full period and also who decides on the asset calculation, creating uncertainty.

perturbation.original_text: The Sponsor shall not be liable for any error of judgment or mistake of law or for any act or omission in the oversight, administration or management of the Trust or the performance of its duties hereunder, except for willful misfeasance, bad faith or gross negligence in the performance of its duties, or by reason of the reckless disregard of its obligations and duties hereunder. As used in this Section 4, the term "Sponsor" shall include Domini and/or any of its affiliates and the directors, officers and employees of Domini and/or any of its affiliates.
perturbation.changed_text: The Sponsor shall only be liable for gross negligence in the direct performance of its duties. The term "Sponsor" in this section is strictly defined as Domini Social Investments LLC, excluding any affiliates, directors, officers, or employees.
perturbation.explanation: This introduces a contradiction by limiting the Sponsor's liability and narrowing the definition of 'Sponsor', conflicting with the broader definition previously given.

perturbation.original_text: This Agreement may be terminated at any time, without the payment of any penalty, with respect to any series or the Trust, by the Board of Trustees of the Trust, or by the Sponsor, in each case on not less than 60 days' written notice to the other party.
perturbation.changed_text: This Agreement may be terminated at any time, without the payment of any penalty, with respect to any series or the Trust, by the Board of Trustees of the Trust with 60 days written notice. The Sponsor may only terminate this agreement if there is a material breach of the agreement by the trust, and after a 30 day cure period.
perturbation.explanation: This introduces a contradiction by giving different requirements for the two parties to terminate. Previously, both parties could terminate at any time with a 60 day notice. Now, the Sponsor can only terminate if the trust materially breaches the contract.
